name: Tales of Sector 1
storyline:
Listen up recruit!

We've recently caught wind of a nasty spreading virus infecting the lower sectors. It's your job to sort out that town so we don't lose our most valuable asset.

Don't forget your moral training though. We don't want a repeat of the Pirate Cove incident. These denizens are easily swayed by the likes of new faces.
summary: In a world overtaken by a deadly virus, you are a recruit with a crucial mission: to stop the infection from spreading to the lower sectors. But your task is not as simple as it seems. You will face moral dilemmas, unexpected challenges and diverse characters along the way. Your choices will shape the story and the destiny of the town.
